transfer_disclaimer: This app currently does not support transfer transactions such as buying or selling STEEM or SBD.
transaction_complete: Click the send button to be redirected to SteemConnect to complete your transaction.
post_interval: You may only post once every 5 minutes
comment_interval: You may only comment once every 20 seconds.
voteDuplicate: You have already voted in a similar way
reblog_duplicate: You have already reblogged this post
reblog_duplicate_fingerprint: Account has already reblogged this post
band_width_error: Your bandwith has been exceeded. Please wait to transact or power up STEEM.
generic_error_description: An error has occured, and we can't process the action at this moment
max_vote_change_exceeded: You have exceeded the maximum number of vote changes on this comment.
small_voting_weight: Voting weight is too small, please accumulate more voting power or steem power
already_voted_description: You have already voted in a similar way.
amount_has_to_be_greater_than_zero: Amount has to be greater than 0.
memo_exchange_required: Memo is required when sending to an exchange.
access_token_expired_description: Your access token is expired, you need to logout and log back in
title: Title
tagsDescription: Separate topics with commas or spaces. Only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphen character is permitted
disclaimer_text: By creating this post you agree to the steem's terms and conditions, which is hosted on steemit's website.
error_saving_empty_title_or_body: Post must contain a title and body before being saved
post_saved_to_drafts: Post has been saved to drafts
steemconnect_login_description: Sign in with SteemConnect so that you can vote, like, comment, and create posts.
switch_accounts_description: If you want to switch accounts you will need to revoke the SteemConnect token by clicking on the revoke token button below, and following the revoke form. After you have successfully revoked the token, press the logout button above.
logout_button_description: If you want to logout of your account, you can press the logout button below
nsfwPostHidden: The contents of this post is currently hidden because it is tagged NSFW.
reported_post_hidden: The contents of this post is currently hidden because you have reported it
lowAuthorReputationPostPreview: The contents of this post is currently hidden because the author has a low reputation or the post has a low rating.
no_upvoted: No one has upvoted this content.
no_downvoted: No one has downvoted this content.
noResultsFound: No results found for your search
errorAuthenticate: There was an error using SteemConnect to perform an action. Please re-authenticate with SteemConnect
userFeedEmpty: User currently has no blog posts.
currentUserFeedEmpty: Your feed is empty, follow users and their latest post will show up on your feed.
empty_feed_check_filters: Feed is currently empty, check your applied filters
currentUserBSteemFeedEmpty: Your bSteem feed is empty, favorite some tags and posts from those tags will show up on your feed.
voting_power_description: Enable the voting slider to specify the exact percentage of Voting Power that you want to use per vote.
votingPercentDescription: Select your default vote value which will be used when the voting slider is enabled.
message_content_is_hidden: Messages are hidden because you have blocked the user
custom_theme_description: Scroll through and click on the preset themes that you want to apply or customize and create your own theme. (After selecting or customizing a theme you might have to restart the app for all theme settings to apply)
primaryColorDescription: This color is the main color that is used throughout the entire app, all links and action items will be converted to this color.
secondaryColorDescription: This color is used for tags
tertiaryColorDescription: This color is used for time stamps and post/comment footer icons
listBackgroundColorDescription: Background color that shows when you view a list of elements such as the different feeds
positiveColorDescription: This color gets applied to the positive trends in the crypto charts
negativeColorDescription: This color gets applied to the negative trends in the crypto charts
reblogConfirmText: This post will appear on your personal feed. This action cannot be reversed.
post_preview_hidden_for_nsfw: This post preview is currently hidden since it is tagged NSFW.
post_hidden_for_low_ratings: This post is currently hidden due to the author's low reputation or low post rating.
post_preview_hidden_for_low_ratings: This post preview is currently hidden due to the author's low reputation or low post rating.
reblog_modal_content: This post will appear on your personal feed. This action cannot be reversed.
no_search_results_found: No results were found for your search.
topics_extra: Separate topics with commas. Only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphen character is permitted.
amount_error_zero: Amount has to be higher than 0.
empty_user_profile: User currently has no blog posts.
beneficiaries_description: This post is sharing rewards with the following accounts:
payout_limit_reached: Payout limit reached onb this post
